topic.title: Direct IP Call
topic.shortdesc: Direct IP call allows two parties, that is, an FXS Port with an analog phone and another VoIP Device, to talk to each other in an ad hoc fashion without an SIP proxy.

body.p: The default Direct IP Calling feature code is *96.

example.p: To call the IP phone, you should dial *96192*168*2*123*5060 on the analog phone.
